18#include "metadata.h"
19#include "config.h"
20
21typedef int (*lock_resource_fn) (struct cmd_context * cmd, const char *resource,
22 uint32_t flags);
23typedef int (*query_resource_fn) (const char *resource, int *mode);
24
25typedef void (*fin_lock_fn) (void);
26typedef void (*reset_lock_fn) (void);
27
28#define LCK_PRE_MEMLOCK 0x00000001 /* Is memlock() needed before calls? */
29#define LCK_CLUSTERED 0x00000002
30
31struct locking_type {
32 uint32_t flags;
33 lock_resource_fn lock_resource;
34 query_resource_fn query_resource;
35
36 reset_lock_fn reset_locking;
37 fin_lock_fn fin_locking;
38};
39
40/*
41 * Locking types
42 */
43int init_no_locking(struct locking_type *locking, struct cmd_context *cmd);
44
45int init_readonly_locking(struct locking_type *locking, struct cmd_context *cmd);
46
47int init_file_locking(struct locking_type *locking, struct cmd_context *cmd);
48
49int init_external_locking(struct locking_type *locking, struct cmd_context *cmd);
50
51int init_cluster_locking(struct locking_type *locking, struct cmd_context *cmd);
52
